ComicInfo.Title: Tied & Torn
ComicInfo.Summary:
While JANEY sleeps in limbo to recover from the epic battle she had with The Demon Snake King, AGGA YAPPA, questions arise and she starts to once again ponder her existence. But namely XULA. Is she really around for JANEY’s benefit or does XULA have a secret agenda?
Look out for this special two-year anniversary edition of ZOMBIE TRAMP as creator Dan Mendoza returns… secrets are uncovered and revelations are revealed!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Dan Mendoza | 1 | B | Risqué Cover, Limited to 2500 | Dan Mendoza | 2 | C | Limited Edition Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Marcelo Costa | 3 | D | Limited Edition Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Marcelo Costa | 4 | E | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Joe Pekar | 5 | F | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Joe Pekar | 6 | G | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Photo Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Photo | 7 | H | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Risqué Photo Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Photo | 8 |
